div.p: Well actually voluntary work at the moment which is I work at a golf club, I drive lawn mowers and I’m learning about the countryside and
tree felling and stuff like that and I’m loving it because it is something totally different to what I’ve done so I’m working as a, if you like,
the oldest apprentice green keeper in Britain at the golf club where I play and there are two other green keepers up there and
I work 2 days a week for 6 hours a day on Tuesday and Thursday and I love it because I’m learning something else
and I would see that for me not so much as a career but more of a way of life really now that I’ve got the time to sort of go and do that
it’s totally different to what I’ve done in the past...
